mapper.select: select material_id, material_type, status, remaining, note from material
select material_id, material_type, status, remaining, note from material where material_id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
select material_id, material_type, status, remaining, note from material where material_type like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into material (material_id, material_type, status, remaining, note) values(#{materialId},#{materialType},#{status},#{remaining},#{note})
